# Beast Totem, Greater (Su)
## Overview
*Beast Totem, Greater (Su)*: While raging, the barbarian gains the pounce special ability, allowing her to make a full attack at the end of a charge. In addition, the damage from her claws increases to 1d8 (1d6 if Small) and the claws deal 3 damage on a critical hit. A barbarian must have the [[Beast Totem (Su)|beast totem]] rage power to select this rage power. A barbarian must be at least 10th level to select this rage power.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 74
